features: POWERFUL MEDIUM-LARGE ROOM AIR PURIFIER–The Honeywell HPA5100 HEPA Air Purifier helps provide cleaner, fresher air. Recommended for med-large rooms (190 sq. ft). HEPA Filtration helps capture up to 99.97% of microscopic airborne allergens & particles.*

IDEAL FOR WILDFIRE SEASON: Wildfire smoke can impact the air quality where you live, even if you don’t live anywhere near the fires themselves. Because smoke contains extremely small particles, air purifiers can help remove some of these particles¹ from your air.

HELPS REDUCE ALLERGENS –This HEPA air purifier has 4 cleaning levels including Turbo Clean. It helps capture the following microscopic airborne allergens and particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris and smoke.*

EFFECTIVE AIR CLEANING & CIRCULATION – The Honeywell HPA5100 Air Purifier filters & circulates air in medium-large 190 sq. ft. rooms up to every 12.5 minutes.** The activated carbon pre-filter helps capture large airborne particles and reduces odors/VOCs.
INSIGHT SERIES –This Honeywell HEPA Air Purifieris part of our InSight Series. This product earned the ENERGY STAR label by meeting strict energy efficient guidelines set by U.S. EPA.

COMPATIBLE DOES NOT MEAN COMPARABLE PERFORMANCE –For best performance, use only Genuine Honeywell air purifier filters. Compatible air purifierfilter replacementsare not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency.
body.description: Honeywell HPA5100 InSight Series HEPA Air Purifier console helps provide cleaner, fresher air in medium-large rooms of 190 square feet. It includes HEPA Filtration, which helps capture up to 99.97% of the following allergens and particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris and smoke*. This Honeywell air purifier can filter & circulate air up to every 12.5 minutes.** If you have pets or stale indoor air, air purifiers help deliver cleaner, fresher air. The Intelligent Air Quality Sensor continuously displays and monitors air quality. Plus, this air purifier includes InSight Display at-a-Glace which illuminates to show the 4 cleaning levels, air quality indicator and Auto Mode setting. This quiet air purifier has an auto-off timer option at 2, 4, or 8 hours, and a dimmer option for control panel lights. This Honeywell HEPA Air Purifier is part of our InSight Series. This product earned the ENERGY STAR label by meeting strict energy efficient guidelines set by the U.S. EPA. Always purchase Genuine Honeywell replacement air purifier filters. They are certified to help capture odors and the following microscopic airborne allergens and particles*: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris and smoke. Other compatible filter replacements are not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency. Recommended filter replacement: True HEPA R Filters 1x/yr. Odor Reducing Pre-Filter A 4x/yr.Disclaimers: * From the air that passes through the filter, 0.3 microns and larger. ** Based on 3rd party independent CADR testing for the smoke CADR value when operated at the highest level. Air circulation depends on many factors, such as room size and configuration. There is no guarantee that all of the air in a room will pass through the filter.The ENERGY STAR name and mark are registered trademarks owned by the U.S. EPA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient HEPA air purifier
reviews.reviewText: I've bought quite a few HEPA air filters because our allergies are so severe. This one has a minimal footprint, is reasonably quiet, and works well. It is somewhat more quiet than the loudest ones we have owned and the footprint compares quite favorably to other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for dust and allergen reduction
reviews.reviewText: Very similar to the prior generation of these Honeywell air purifiers...the difference is primarily cosmetic. Like the older ones, it's a bit on the noisy side, but it does a great job removing dust and allergens from the air. I have quieter purifiers and while they have similar performance in terms of odor elimination (via activated carbon filters, which is an optional accessory for this Honeywell product) they simply can't match the dust/pollen/etc. reduction of this unit. Sure it's a bit louder, especially at higher speeds, but it's also more effective at those speeds than those other ones are capable of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not going to lie I thought its be bigger (totally on me to not look at the dimensions) however I actually love that it's smaller then I thought bevause it's pretty powerful! Love the multi settings and the, only if you want, timer feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased this along with the pet filter
reviews.reviewText: We bought this filter because of the special pet filter that can be purchased separately. It works great for our master bedroom. The unit is quiet, efficient, and takes care of the dog smell in our room. Our dog is a hound mix so he has a very strong "dog smell" and this unit removes it in our bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Low level hum ruins and otherwise good air purifier
reviews.reviewText: I had the previous model, the HPA 100, for my daughter's bedroom and it worked out really well. I went with Honeywell because it seemed to have good features without creating ozone which was important for me. I decided that I wanted to get one for our bedroom too. Lo and behold there was a new version available. The new version is a little slicker looking, though, the clear plastic portion looks a little cheesy / will probably be prone to scratches. It is also a bit more efficient. However, the older model actually may cost less money to run because it uses less electricity / is smaller. This is also a bit bulkier than the old version, though the trade-off is it does purify more air. The real sticking point, though, was the low-level hum that this unit and the bigger models emited. It seems that the actual fan noise might be a little bit lower, and maybe I am just not used to this particular frequency of noise, but I just couldn't get over it. I also tested the noise volume between the new model and old model with a DB app and it did confirm that the new model was about 5 dB louder. This is in no way a scientific comparison, but it confirmed my anecdotal feelings about it. I have lots of fans, and music products, and none of them emit a hum like this. I usually associate a hum like this with some sort of grounding issue. Ultimately, I was disappointed and I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My third Honeywell air purifier
reviews.reviewText: My other 2 work fine but I decided to add a third to use in another room. They work great, they all use the same filters, easy to use, etc. Like others have mentioned it does show auto in the picture but this model didn’t come with it. Not a huge deal as my old ones don’t have that but it would have been a nice feature to try. Also the older ones have handles on the side so you can easily pick them up, this one doesn’t have handles. I was tempted to give it 4 stars but for the price it performs well and I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge fans of Honeywell purifiers
reviews.reviewText: We originally got one at Costco and it works amazing! They don’t currently carry any but thankfully Amazon does! It is quiet and also really pretty, this version has a clear backing that lights up for the mode it’s in. Don’t worry, you can dim it! Highly recommend this brand of purifiers, it’s the best bang for your buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Have it in a small bedroom. Seems to work. I like the indicator light for a night light but you can turn it off if preferred. This is the smallest model.
